recipesJson.name: Lawson Bar
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
I borrowed fairly heavily from Mechmod RN's Yogi and Sejouced's Granola Bay with a few twists.

The Maple syrup actually cooks the apple in the cran apple a bit, which is quite nice.

The pudding base is the majority of the AP in the recipe along with the cereal 27, along with a lovely buttery note.
